## Buckets.listPath() method

Returns information about a bucket path.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
listPath(key: string, path: string, ctx?: ContextInterface): Promise<pb.ListPathReply.AsObject>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | Unique (IPNS compatible) identifier key for a bucket. |
|  path | string | A file/object (sub)-path within a bucket. |
|  ctx | ContextInterface | Context object containing web-gRPC headers and settings. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;pb.ListPathReply.AsObject&gt;
